General.Name: Taurus Armas S.A
General.Description: Taurus Armas S.A., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the production and trading of firearms in Brazil and internationally. It operates through three segments: Firearms and Accessories, Helmets and Accessories, and Metal Injection Molding. It offers pistols, revolvers, long weapons, and accessories. The company sells its products under the Taurus, Heritage, and Rossi brand names. Taurus Armas S.A. was incorporated in 1939 and is headquartered in São Leopoldo, Brazil.
General.Address: Prédio A, São Leopoldo, RS, Brazil, 93035-411
